description: Halle James & Alexia Rae are at it again. Yelling, screaming, raising all kinds of hell and disturbing the neighbors. It's not the first time, and probably not the last.Officer Cody Cummings lives by the age-old adage, ?Speak softly and carry a big stick.?So when he is called onto the scene of this particular domestic disturbance, he tries first to calm the situation with words, but when that doesn't seem to work, his training and instinct  kick in, and he doesn't hesitate to use his concealed ?weapon?.Enjoy!
title: JUSTICE IS CUMMING
